headline: Does Synchrony (SYF) Use HVAC Financing Renewals To Deepen Its Embedded Credit Advantage?
summary: In early December 2025, Synchrony Financial’s long-running residential HVAC financing collaboration with Mitsubishi Electric Trane HVAC US LLC was renewed through a new multi-year agreement effective October 1, 2025, extending a decade of offering customizable financing solutions to help homeowners upgrade and maintain energy-efficient heating and cooling systems. This renewal underscores how Synchrony’s embedded financing tools can support contractor sales while aligning with rising demand...
